entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
